title: Within Temptation - Let Us Burn (Elements & Hydra Live in Co

In November 2012, WITHIN TEMPTATION challenged themselves to create one of their most impressive arena shows ever, to celebrate the bandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s 15th birthday.
